name: Carousel
tagline: openframeworks app to control a KodakCarousel using ofxDfRobotRelayShield for Arduino
body:
### Project Description.
Carousel is an openframeworks application used for a contemporary dance performance. It synchonizes the control of 2 slide projectors and the scene lights with the soundtrack. To control the projectors and the lights are used relays.

### Representations
   03.2013 Barcelona, El Colador
12.05.2013 Barcelona, Studio P52

### Project Team
Dancer, Choreography: Laila Tafur

Coding, Photography: Ovidiu Cincheza

Sound: Tony Higuci


### Contact

@ovicin
